name: Rooted Rumble: The Battle For That Which Is Central To All Battles: The Right To Live
name_original: Rooted Rumble: The Battle For That Which Is Central To All Battles: The Right To Live
description:
RR:TBFTWICTAB:TRTS for short is rumble between the trees to survive in a harsh environment of a hole in someone's backyard. This rumble for the ages is 4 player local multiplayer. Each Rooted Rumbler must collect as much water as possible before they are killed in this arid, harsh landscape. 

Using Q/E, you can play as Bluey, a young root with dreams of going into politics to make their home a better place for the generations yet to come. Using X/V, you can play as Gren, an elderly root trying desperately to hang on to their youth and their dreams of being a Pro Rooted Rumbler. Using I/P, you can play as Yeller, a grizzled detective who's days away from retirement, with plans to travel the world with their beloved after they finish this one last case. Using the left and right arrow keys you can play as Red, the root embodiment of all evil in the world, who wants to gain the strength to destroy all life.

Credits:

Will Ozeas - Programming, Audio

Jean Cho - 3D Art 

Efe Cekirge - Programming 

Joanne Tsai - UI Art & Implementation 

Kalen Gressing - Environmental Design & Story

Phoebe Wu - Producer 

This game was made in one weekend for the 2023 Global Game Jam, as well as for 53-471 Game Design, Prototyping, and Production. 

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rooted-rumble-battle-which-central-all-battles-right-survive-2

OST: https://soundcloud.com/willowpet/rooted-rumble-rooted-rumble-ost-1
